title: Mike Wilson: Weighing Fed Intervention, Geopolitics
description: On today's episode, As 2020 begins, central bank moves and reawakened geopolitical risk promise to be key market catalysts. Chief Investment Officer Mike Wilson details the potential impact on portfolios.
